passages.text:
The City lights illuminate the wet sidewalk in front of you as you walk toward Rolly's Pub. "Tonight's the night" you think to yourself as you enter the dimly lit pub, the smell of cigarette smoke a slap to the face as you look at the bar. You take note of a rather serious looking woman sitting at the bar, velvet dress and lipstick to match. "Esra" you think to yourself. "I guess this is it"

[[Walk up to her-> Esra01]]
[[Survey the area-> SurveyBar]]
passages.name: Beginning

passages.text:
Rolly's is a run of the mill pub though its not very busy as it's only tuesday. A man sits at the bar next to Esra, clearly drunk as he is barely able to keep his balance on the stool. As you observe the pub for a little longer you take note of a regular referring to the Bartender as "Oliver".

[[Walk up to Esra-> Esra01]]
passages.name: SurveyBar

passages.text:
You take the empty bar seat next to Esra. You look at the Bartender and order a

[[Scotch->Esra02]]
[[Whiskey->Esra02]]
[[Vodka->Esra02]]
passages.name: Esra01

passages.text:
"Hi" She says coyly. "I'm sure you know the drill, who's your contact?"

[[Tiana->Death01]]
[[Oliver->Esra03]]
[[Callum->Death01]]
[[Elizabeth->Death01]]
passages.name: Esra02

passages.text:
"Oh..." she pauses "How unfortunate." With a loud bang you wind is knocked out of you right as you process what the noise was. You fall over as your vision fades to black...

[[Restart->Beginning]]
passages.name: Death01

passages.text:
"Good, I'm so tired of these formalities what are the chances that someone even knew what the right thing to say was?"

[[Stay Silent->Esra04]]
[[Strange wouldn't it be->Esra04]]
passages.name: Esra03

passages.text:
"Well regardless, here's the payment, I expect the job to be done quickly and without a hitch." She hands you what appears to be over 10,000 Euros.

[[I wouldn't worry->End]]
passages.name: Esra04
